name: QB Kings - Endless Fantasy Football Hero 2k17 Free
name_original: QB Kings - Endless Fantasy Football Hero 2k17 Free
description:
Be an elite QB and throw the football into the endzone!

Celebrate your touchdown with a dab

Time your throw and don't let the defenders block the ball.
____________________________________________

• Simple one-tap gameplay
• 50 different levels
• Endless mode
____________________________________________

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
